import React from 'react'; import {useQuery} from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import gql from 'graphql-tag'; const MY_PRODUCTS = gql` query MY_PRODUCTS { user{ id username email products{ id name description price imageUrl } } } ` const UserProducts = () => { const { data, loading, error} = useQuery(MY_PRODUCTS) console.log(data) return (
ImageImageImageImageImage
{/* Header */}

Image

Name

Price

Actions

{/* Body */}
{ data && data.user && data.user.products.length > 0 && data.user.products.map(product =>

{product.name}

{product.price}

)}
) } export default UserProducts
